overview: There once was a Sleepy Bear who couldn’t get to sleep,  Not even after hours on a mattress two feet deep.  Warm milk didn’t do the trick, nor did counting sheep,  Even the pillow’s synthetic fibre felt dirt cheap.  But of all disturbances the worst was his master Fred,  And all the ruckus emanating from his bed.
title: Sleepy Bear’s Lullabye-Bye
